Welcome to GatherNews¶

The goal for GatherNews is to quickly and simply capture news data.

Once you’ve gathered a custom news dataset, you might want to analyze your data with nltk or gensim.

GatherNews depends on two key external libraries: feedparser and Simpleflake (distributed ID generation for the lazy).

User’s Guide¶

This part of the documentation begins with a ‘quick start’ for GatherNews and then goes more in depth about its features.
